creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
signed: signed LRQ; date, LRQ:  大正八年吉祥月日・天禄宗完 (An auspicious date, 1919, Tenroku Sōkan); red seal: 天禄 {Tenroku}
text: The exact purpose of this painting is unclear. Given its large size, and because it was painted on wood, it may have been used as an architectural element. Perhaps it was installed on the ceiling of a temple hall.
title: Jewel-Holding Dragon among Clouds
